name: OPENER Lab
overview:
OPENER is a social network service that organizes your data and everyday life into the realm of time.

One can see what friends have done, are doing, and will do, as well as produce data on particular subjects all based on your own timeline, using Facebook API. Opener reevaluates the value of time, and allows for people to communicate through time threads, something that no other SNS has ever had before. Through this service, you can talk about private matters in your daily life, sharing only with the people you wish - creating and developing efficient communication for intimate relationships. I. Time + SNS

OPENER is an easy, simple, and private social network service. You can share your daily life or events with 30 of your closest friends. You can expore you and your friends timeline based on the present. II. Past, present and future

Enjoy a trip to the past, present and future just by flicking back and forth. You will soon be marvelled by what you experience, becoming engaged into the threads that you and your friends have created. III. Time Platform

OPENER is a pioneer of a new field, intending to discover and build new business models based on time. Time, which is an essential part of human life, will become an inevitable platform for you. OPENER enjoys challenging themselves and creating something new every day.
